channel.title: [PI] Ancients Magic On Players
channel.description:
For some reason when i try using mage on players in wildy it splashes so much..Like theres something definatly wrong.. it splashes like 10 times then it hits once.. When i use magic on npc's it works perfectly 100% though.. Watch this.
[URL=http://tinypic.com/r/15eeo77/6]View My Video[/URL]

How is it spoonfeeding… im not asking u to make me a server im asking what do i do to fix this magic problem… i still havent gotten an answer . if u know any guides that would be great… or if u know any codes i can add or replace to fix this that would be helpful… instead of acting like a wanna be forums mod

Can u teamviewer me if u get a chance or just reply on here what to do if you dont want to teamviewer[/quote]

It is combatassistant, and and he wont teamview you either, and the rule’s clearly say we arnt a spoonfeeding community not being a douche or anything.

item.title: [PI] Ancients Magic On Players
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

I remember fixing it for Kyle? Or whatever his name was, whenever Xyle was online.

Find something related to:

if (Misc.random(o.getCombat().mageDef()) > Misc.random(mageAtk())) { c.magicFailed = true; } else { c.magicFailed = false; }

Read full topic
